name: OTEL Kafka Cluster
description: Performance and health metrics for Kafka Cluster

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(kafka.brokers) as 'Brokers' FROM Metric WHERE metricName='kafka.brokers'
SELECT latest(kafka.cluster.topic.count) AS 'Topics' FROM Metric WHERE metricName='kafka.cluster.topic.count'
SELECT latest(kafka.cluster.partition.count) AS 'Total partitions' FROM Metric WHERE metricName='kafka.cluster.partition.count'
SELECT latest(`kafka.partition.offline`) AS 'Offline partitions'  FROM Metric WHERE metricName='kafka.partition.offline'
SELECT uniqueCount(group) as 'Consumer groups' FROM Metric WHERE metricName='kafka.consumer_group.members'
SELECT rate(sum(kafka.leader.election.rate), 1 minute) AS 'Leader elections' FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'kafka.leader.election.rate' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT rate(sum(kafka.unclean.election.rate), 1 minute) AS 'Unclean leader elections/min' FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'kafka.unclean.election.rate' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT max(kafka.partition.non_preferred_leader) AS 'Partitions with non-preferred leader' FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'kafka.partition.non_preferred_leader' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT max(kafka.broker.fenced.count) AS 'Fenced brokers' FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'kafka.broker.fenced.count' TIMESERIES AUTO
